hero.title: Stand with Palestine
hero.subtitle: Building solidarity through education, advocacy, and action
hero.description: Join our community working towards Palestinian rights and Finnish-Palestinian understanding through meaningful engagement and grassroots activism.

features.title: Our Impact
features.subtitle: Working together for justice and human rights

advocacy.title: Policy Advocacy
advocacy.description: Engaging with Finnish policymakers to support Palestinian rights and international law.

education.title: Community Education
education.description: Raising awareness about Palestinian history, culture, and current situation through events and resources.

solidarity.title: Direct Solidarity
solidarity.description: Supporting Palestinian communities through campaigns, fundraising, and humanitarian aid.

cta.title: Ready to Make a Difference?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of supporters standing with Palestine
cta.description: Your voice matters. Whether through membership, signing petitions, or attending events, every action counts towards building a more just world.

meta.title: Our Impact - Supporting Palestinian Artisans | Sumud
meta.description: Discover how your purchases create positive change. Every product supports Palestinian artisans, preserves cultural heritage, and empowers communities.

hero.title: Every Purchase Creates Impact
hero.subtitle: When you shop with Sumud, you're not just buying a product. You're supporting Palestinian artisans, preserving cultural heritage, and empowering communities to build a brighter future.

stats.title: Our Impact in Numbers
stats.subtitle: Together, we're building sustainable livelihoods and preserving cultural heritage one purchase at a time.

process.title: How It Works
process.subtitle: A simple purchase creates a ripple effect of positive change across Palestinian communities.

artisans.title: Meet Our Artisans
artisans.subtitle: Behind every product is a skilled artisan with a story of resilience, creativity, and dedication to preserving Palestinian culture.

areas.title: Areas of Impact
areas.subtitle: Our work creates positive change across multiple dimensions of Palestinian life and culture.

certifications.title: Our Commitment to Transparency
certifications.subtitle: We hold ourselves to the highest standards of ethical sourcing, fair trade, and environmental responsibility.
certifications.trustStatement: We believe in complete transparency. Every product comes with information about the artisan who made it, where it was created, and how your purchase directly impacts their community.

cta.title: Start Making an Impact Today
cta.subtitle: Every purchase supports Palestinian artisans and their communities. Join us in preserving heritage and building a better future.

membership.title: Join Our Movement
membership.subtitle: Become part of a growing community advocating for Palestinian rights
membership.description: Join thousands of supporters working towards Palestinian rights and Finnish-Palestinian understanding through education, advocacy, and cultural exchange.

form.title: Member Information
form.subtitle: Please provide your details to complete registration

form.chapterHint: Connect with other members in your area
form.oneTimeDescription: Pay once for annual membership. You'll receive a renewal reminder before expiration.
form.monthlyDescription: Automatic monthly payments. Cancel anytime. Convenient and supports ongoing solidarity.

membership.privacyMessage: We take your privacy seriously. Your information is securely stored and only used for membership purposes.
